title: WATCH: Ray J and Princess Love’s cute gender reveal for their second baby
text:
WATCH: Ray J and Princess Love’s cute gender reveal for their second baby share this

American singer, Ray J and his wife, Princess Love are expecting a second baby and it’s a boy!

The couple, who have a one-year-old daughter, Melody, decided not to do things the conventional way with colour-specific balloons when revealing the gender of their baby. Instead, they reached for the skies instead, literally.

Documenting the entire journey on Instagram, Princess posted a video where she explained what they were about to do. She films the video while her hubby drives and their cute little girl sleeps in in the back seat.

“So, we’re on our way to find out what the gender of our new baby is. We’re going to the helicopter place and they’re going to fly up in the air and release the blue or pink powder, that’s when we’ll find out what it is,” she said.

“I’m a little sceptical about getting on the plane because it might be a little too loud For Melody, so, we’re going to get there, scope it out a little bit and then we’ll go from there,” she added.

READ MORE: PICS: Ray J & Princess Love's wedding

“Once they touched down at the helicopter facility, Princess and baby Melody stayed behind and let Dad do the honors. Ray J filmed himself from inside the aircraft, looking excited for the big reveal. While in the sky, the plane unleashes a beautiful blue powder in the air,” Essence reports.









The reality TV star admitted to having a sneak peek while she stayed behind with little Melody before the helicopter went up, according to E! News
description: American singer, Ray J and his wife, Princess Love are expecting a second baby and it’s a boy!
